subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The leader Alberto Contador all but secured victory in the Vuelta a España when he finished second in the crucial Stage 20 mountain time trial from Granja de San Ildefonso to Alto de Navacerrada.
snippet: The leader Alberto Contador all but secured victory in the Vuelta a España when he finished second in the crucial Stage 20 mountain time trial from Granja de San Ildefonso to Alto de Navacerrada.
